cards.content: Muscle Hub completely changed the way I train! The workout plans are smart, easy to follow, and perfectly match my goals. I've seen real progress in just a few weeks. Highly recommended for anyone serious about fitness!

items.question: How do I start the free plan?
items.answer: Once you register, you will get instant access to our free plan and can start tracking your workouts and nutrition immediately.

items.question: Do I need gym equipment?
items.answer: No, you can start with home workouts that require no equipment, or choose gym exercises if you have access to a gym.

items.question: Is there a personalized nutrition plan?
items.answer: Yes, our system suggests a personalized nutrition plan based on your weight, goal, and daily activity level.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: We prioritize your privacy. Your data is stored securely and is never shared with third parties.
